snippet.title: Codex of Victory, official trailer (eng)
snippet.description:
Take control over a distant frontier planet in this strategy wargame from creators of the Majesty 2, Warlock and Elven Legacy. Build a huge underground base, strengthen the army and repel enemy forces. Be loyal to your King and fight for Humanity! 
-----------
Already in Early Access on Steam http://store.steampowered.com/app/464100/
